node.address: Getsemani, Calle del guerrero # 29-89 , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
Casa Mary is located in Cartagena, Getsemani. Getsemani is a great choice for travelers interested in architecture and history. Casa Mary is 400 m from the Museum of Modern Art and 800 m from Bocagrande Beaches. Rafael Nuñez Airport is 1 km away.

This 3-star hotel offers comfortable, spacious private rooms. Perfect for a relaxing stay. All rooms are styled with tiled floors, and feature private bathrooms.

Located in Cartagena de Indias' historic centre, this hotel offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and plasma TVs. Massage sessions can be requested. The Gold Museum is 400 m away.
Fresh and airy, rooms at Casa Mary are fitted with wooden furnishing and air conditioning. All of them are styled with tiled floors, and feature private bathrooms.

Bikes can be rented to explore the city, and several excursions can be booked at the tour desk. There is a shared terrace with views of Plaza de la Trinidad square. Currency exchange service is provided.
Casa Mary is 400 m from the Museum of Modern Art and 800 m from Bocagrande Beaches. Rafael Nuñez Airport is 1 km away.

description.description: Casa Mary is a beautiful and comfortable 3-star hotel located in Cartagena. Located in Cartagena de Indias' historic centre, comfortable rooms, and free Wi-Fi access throughout the building. The property has a 24-hour front desk, laundry facilities, air conditioning and breakfast is included.
